channel.title: Git on ECS Hack Week 2019
channel.description: Recent content in Git on ECS Hack Week 2019

item.title: Installing Git and a Shell
item.description: git and github git is a system used for version control and collaboration. You should have a github account and ensure that git is installed on your computer. Bash shell and git software version control The bash shell provides a programming environment that is often used to manipulate files, install programs, and basic data analysis. The git version control system (along with the github website) are widely used for sharing codes and collaborative development of software.
